Description: GREAT FALLS HOOKED ON FISHING NOT DRUGS, INC (RECIPIENT) SHALL CONDUCT FISHING EVENTS THROUGHOUT CALENDAR YEARS 2022 THROUGH 2027 FOR UNDERSERVED AND AT-RISK YOUTH WITH AN EMPHASIS ON YOUTH WITH DISABILITIES (5-18 YEARS OLD) (COLLECTIVELY, THE PARTICIPANTS) AT RECLAMATIONS TIBER DAM (LAKE ELWELL) LOCATION. ADDITIONAL AREAS MAY BE ADDED BY AMENDING THIS SCOPE OF WORK AS APPROVED BY THE BUREAU OF RECLAMATION PROGRAM OFFICER. THE FISHING EVENT SHALL TEACH PARTICIPANTS ABOUT RECREATIONAL FISHING AND ITS HEALTH BENEFITS, APPROPRIATE PUBLIC USES OF NATURAL RESOURCES, ENCOURAGE STEWARDSHIP, AND PROMOTE A CONSERVATION ETHIC.

THE MAYFLY PROJECT  RECIPIENT  SHALL CONDUCT FISHING EVENTS THROUGHOUT CALENDAR YEARS 2022 THROUGH 2027 FOR UNDERSERVED AND AT RISK YOUTH WITH AN EMPHASIS ON YOUTH WITH DISABILITIES  5 18 YEARS OLD   COLLECTIVELY, THE PARTICIPANTS  AT BEND, OREGON AND IDAHO FALLS, IDAHO LAKES  ADDITIONAL AREAS MAY BE ADDED BY AMENDING THIS SCOPE OF WORK AS APPROVED BY THE BUREAU OF RECLAMATION  THE FISHING EVENT SHALL TEACH PARTICIPANTS ABOUT RECREATIONAL FISHING, APPROPRIATE PUBLIC USES OF NATURAL RESOURCES, ENCOURAGE STEWARDSHIP, AND PROMOTE A CONSERVATION ETHIC
